attributes.action: enter Ultimate Frisbee in to the 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ultimate is a sport which has been around for many years and is centred more around the Spirit of the Game:
Ultimate stresses sportsmanship and fair play. Competitive play is encouraged, but never at the expense of respect between players, adherence to the rules, and the basic joy of play.
I believe Ultimate embodies many of the ideals of the Olympics and would be a great addition to the games.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " enter Ultimate Frisbee in to the 2012 olympics."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12868.asp

Prime Minister's Office
